List of index and the percent over total US stock market. source from wikipedia and the offical websites.

+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| Index                                                                    | Market Cap (%) | Comment                                                     |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [S&P 500](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%26P_500)                       | 80%            |                                                             |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [S&P 400](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%26P_400)                       | 7%             |                                                             |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [S&P 600](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%26P_600)                       | 3%             |                                                             |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [S&P 1500](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%26P_1500)                     | 90%            |                                                             |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [S&P 100](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%26P_100)                       | 51%            |                                                             |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [Russell 3000](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_3000_Index)         | 98%            |                                                             |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [Russell 1000](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_1000_Index)         | 88.2%          | 90% of Russell 3000                                         |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [Russell 2000](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_2000_Index)         | 9.8%           | 10% of Russell 3000                                         |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [Russell Top 50](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_Top_50_Index)     | 39.2%          | 40% of Russell 3000                                         |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [Russell Top 200](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_Top_200_Index)   | 68%            | 63% of Russell 1000 (wiki), 68% (official)                  |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [Russell MidCap](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_Midcap_Index)     | 27.3%          | 31% of Russell 1000, 800 smallest companies in Russell 1000 |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| [Russell Microcap](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_Microcap_Index) | < 3%           | 1000 smallest securities in Russell 2000                    |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+

Table: Major index and their market cap.

Some numbers might be different from the offical website. For example, as of 2020-03-01, [_Russell Top 200_ FactSheet](https://research.ftserussell.com/Analytics/FactSheets/temp/c09e689d-98a0-4b60-9b22-3548cac4d6d9.pdf) says:

> The index represents approximately 68% of the US market.

However, wiki say

> _Russell Top 200_ represents 63% of total market capitalization in the Russell 1000 Index.
